solution_line_template: The "ABC" books, on the other hand, were sold for a total of {num_abc_books_sold} * {cost_abc_book} = $<<{num_abc_books_sold}*{cost_abc_book}={earnings_abc_books}>>{earnings_abc_books}.
The difference between earnings from these two books is {earnings_top_books} - {earnings_abc_books} = $<<{earnings_top_books}-{earnings_abc_books}={difference_in_earnings}>>{difference_in_earnings}.
